item.description:
It's that time of the year to grab your heavy coat, gloves and scarfs and head on over to Newburyport for Holiday invitation night.  We will enjoy merchant hospitality, live entertainment, fabulous shopping and dining - and of course the spirit of the holidays - in beautiful and festive downtown Newburyport and The Tannery, so come on over and spend the night with some fun people.

We may stay together or not, if crowds and being outside for a long time is not something you consider fun, then this event may not be for you, please take that into consideration when RSVPing for this event.

This event will be scheduled on my 2 Meetup sites, (Our Circle of Friends and Connection & Friends) there may be more people going to this event then you see.

Take a minute now and put the Meetup phone into your phone, that way if you are are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, you already have it in your phone:  978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Cost: The event is FREE, you pay for what you buy, (if anything).

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you in advance for paying your dues!

BAD snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

We will wait 15 minutes for you to show up at the meeting spot, if you are running late please give a call and ask that we wait for you, or catch up with us along the way.

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

Looking forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be outside waiting on the corner. (This is just a meeting spot)
item.name: Invitation Night
